module.p:
leum maigheach a hare jumps –
Bha Màiri agus Seumas anns a’ mhonadh an dé. [...] Leum maigheach a mach as an fheur agus ruith i gu luath suas a’ bhruthach.
Mary and James were on the moor yesterday. [...] A hare jumped out of the grass and it ran swiftly up the slope. td. 76

leum uan a lamb jumps –
Bha an crodh blàth le teas na gréine agus bha iad ’nan seasamh anns na lochan beaga a bha an siud ’s an seo air feadh a’ mhonaidh. Bha na h-uain bheaga a’ leum agus a’ cluich mu thimcheall am màthraichean.
The cattle were warm with the heat of the sun and they were standing in the little lakes which were here and there throughout the moor. The little lambs were jumping and playing about their mothers. td. 146

leum ... à feur ... jumps out of grass –
Bha Màiri agus Seumas anns a’ mhonadh an dé. [...] Leum maigheach a mach as an fheur agus ruith i gu luath suas a’ bhruthach.
Mary and James were on the moor yesterday. [...] A hare jumped out of the grass and it ran swiftly up the slope. td. 76
